text: Luchdaich a-nuas 6000 bliadhna de eachdraidh a ' chinne-daonna

notes: timespan, age (Adam was 130 years old when Shem was born)
years when used as age for a person (different word than years in some languages), like he is 23 years old
if the word "year" appears after the numeral, like "at the age of 35 years"
first king of southern kingdom of Juda
For 3 years Jeoahaz and Jeoash reigned together
reign only recorded 6 months, probably only established 792 BCE

text: Israel anns an fhàsach 1513 gu 1473 BCE - 40 bliadhna
english: Israel in the wilderness 1513 to 1473 B.C.E. – 40 years

text: 479 bliadhna gus an deach an teampall a thogail - 1 Rìgh 6: 1
english: 479 years until the temple construction – 1 Kings 6:1

text: 3.5 bliadhna de sheirbheis Ìosa, air a chur gu bàs Nisan 14mh, 33 CE.
english: 3.5 years of Jesus service, executed Nisan 14th, 33 C.E.

text: 7 tursan - 2520 bliadhna chun na Rìoghachd Messianic 1914 CE (Daniel 4:23)
english: 7 times – 2520 years to the Messianic Kingdom 1914 C.E. (Daniel 4:23)

text: Cogadh Trithead Bliadhna san Roinn Eòrpa 1618-1648
Ciad Turas Miseanaraidh Phòil, c. 47-48 CE le Barnabas agus Iain Marc
english: First Missionary Journey of Paul, c. 47-48 C.E. with Barnabas and John Mark

text: Cùis an timcheall-ghearraidh ann an Antioch, co-labhairt ann an Ierusalem c. 49 C.E.
english: Circumcision issue at Antioch, conference in Jerusalem c. 49 C.E.

text: An Dara Turas Miseanaraidh c. 49-52 CE le Silas (Silvanus)
english: Second Missionary Journey c. 49-52 C.E with Silas (Silvanus)

text: An Treas Turas Miseanaraidh c. 52-56 C.E.
Pòl ann an grèim ann an Cesarea c. 56-58 C.E.
english: Paul in custody in Caesarea c. 56-58 C.E.

text: A’ chiad phrìosan aig Pòl anns an Ròimh c. 59-61 C.E.
english: Paul’s first imprisonment in Rome c. 59-61 C.E.

text: dara prìosan Phòil anns an Ròimh c. 65 CE, 2 Timoteus sgrìobhta, Pòl a chur gu bàs
english: Paul’s second imprisonment in Rome c. 65 CE, 2 Timothy written, Paul executed

text: Galba, Otho agus Vitellius (Bliadhna nan Ceithir Impirean)
english: Galba, Otho and Vitellius (Year of the Four Emperors)

text: Ecsodus às an Èiphit air 14mh Nisan, 1513 BCE
english: Exodus from Egypt on Nisan 14th, 1513 B.C.E.

notes: Destruction of Samaria 740 B.C.E. by Assyria
english: Destruction of Samaria 740 B.C.E. by Assyria

text: sgrios Ierusalem 607 BCE le Babilon, 390 bliadhna an dèidh sgaradh na rìoghachd (Eseciel 4: 5)
english: Destruction of Jerusalem 607 B.C.E. by Babylon, 390 years after the division of the kingdom (Ezekiel 4:5)

text: Teampall ann an Ierusalem air ath-thogail ann an 515 BCE
Milleadh Ierusalem 70 CE leis an Ròimh fo Thitus
english: Destruction of Jerusalem 70 C.E. by Rome under Titus

text: Deireadh àm nan dùthchannan (Luke 21:24), tha rìoghachd Dhè a’ tòiseachadh a’ riaghladh air neamh 1914 CE.
english: End of the time of the nations (Luke 21:24), God’s kingdom starts to rule in heaven 1914 C.E.

text: Vulgate air a chrìochnachadh le Jerome (eadar-theangachadh Laideann den Bhìoball) c. 405 C.E.
english: Vulgate completed by Jerome (Latin translation of the bible) c. 405 C.E.

text: Teacs Grèigeach de na Sgriobtairean Grèigeach Crìosdail air fhoillseachadh le Desiderius Erasmus à Rotterdam 1516
english: Greek text of Christian Greek Scriptures published by Desiderius Erasmus of Rotterdam 1516

text: Bidh Iosa a’ tòiseachadh a sheirbheis 29 CE (Lucas 3: 1, 21)
meadhan na seachdain “ìobairt gu sgur” Daniel 9:27
english: middle of week “sacrifice to cease” Daniel 9:27

text: Bhaisteadh Cornelius aig deireadh 70 seachdainean (Daniel 9:24) ann an 36 CE.
english: Cornelius baptized at the end of 70 weeks (Daniel 9:24) in 36 C.E.

text: deireadh na h-ùine ro-cholumbach ann an Ameireagaidh 1492
english: end of the pre-columbian period in the Americas 1492

text: foillseachadh neo-eisimeileachd 13 coloinidhean ann an Ameireagaidh 1776
english: declaration of independence of 13 colonies in America 1776

text: Lorg Tischendorf an Codex Sinaiticus bhon 4mh linn ann an 1844
english: Tischendorf discovers the Codex Sinaiticus from the 4th century in 1844

text: Tha a’ chiad iris de “Zion’s Watch Tower and Herald of Christ's Presence” air fhoillseachadh ann an 1879
english: The first issue of “Zion’s Watch Tower and Herald of Christ’s Presence” is published in 1879

text: Tha an “Photo-Drama of Creation” ri fhaicinn an toiseach ann an New York air 11 Faoilleach 1914
english: The “Photo-Drama of Creation” is first shown in New York on January 11, 1914

text: Ghabh Oileanaich a’ Bhìobaill ri ainm ùr – Fianaisean Iehòbha (Isaiah 43:10, 12) ann an Columbus, Ohio, 1931
english: The Bible Students adopted a new name – Jehovah’s Witnesses (Isaiah 43:10, 12) in Columbus, Ohio, 1931

text: Thòisich Sgoil Bhìoball Watchtower ann an Gilead air Diluain, 1 Gearran, 1943
english: Watchtower Bible School of Gilead began on Monday, February 1, 1943

text: Tha “New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures” a chaidh fhoillseachadh ann am Manchester, Sasainn air 18 Ògmhios, 1960, a’ toirt a-steach an t-ainm Ieh `obhah ann am mòran phàirtean den Bhìoball
english: “New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures” released in Manchester, England on June 18, 1960, reintroduce the name Jehovah in many parts of the Bible

text: Chaidh an leabhar “The Truth That Leads to Eternal Life” fhoillseachadh ann an 1968
english: The book “The Truth That Leads to Eternal Life” released 1968

text: Tòiseachadh JW.ORG le stiùireadh ann am ministrealachd na rìoghachd Dùbhlachd 2012
english: Start of JW.ORG with instructions in kingdom ministry December 2012

text: “Eadar-theangachadh Cruinne Ùr de na Sgriobtairean Naoimh” ath-sgrùdaichte air fhoillseachadh aig coinneamh bhliadhnail 2013, air a bharrrachadh airson a chleachdadh gu didseatach agus air-loidhne
notes: new edition with digital and online in mind
english: Revised “New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures” released at annual meeting 2013, optimized to be used digitally and online

text: Cruth ùr de choinneamh meadhan-seachdain le “leabhar-obrach coinneimh” a’ tòiseachadh san Fhaoilleach 2016
english: New format of midweek meeting with “meeting workbook” starting January 2016

text: Suidheachadh geopolitical leis an ainm “Cogadh Fuar” 1945-1991
Chaidh an loidhne-tìm seo a chruthachadh ann an 2023, a’ bhliadhna as teotha ann an eachdraidh a’ chinne-daonna agus na 125,000 bliadhna mu dheireadh.
english: This timeline was created in 2023, the hottest year in human history and the last 125,000 years

text: Leningrad Codex sgrìobhte ann an Cairo AD 1008
english: Leningrad Codex written in Cairo AD 1008

text: Bidh Iain a’ sgrìobhadh “taisbeanaidh” fhad ‘s a bha e na fhògarrach air Patmos 96-98 CE.
english: John writes “revelation” while exiled on Patmos 96-98 C.E.

text: An Buddha – Siddhartha Gautama c.563-c.483 BCE
english: The Buddha – Siddhartha Gautama c.563-c.483 B.C.E

english: Hijrah - Journey Mecca to Medina 16 July 622

text: 1513 BCE Tha an Èiphit a’ faighinn 10 plàighean
Reic Iòsaph mar thràill aig aois 17 - Gen 37: 2
english: Joseph sold as slave at the age of 17 – Gen 37:2

text: Cyrus the Great, Cambyses II, Darius I 490 BCE, Xerxes I 480 BCE (fear aig Esther, Daniel 11: 2)

english: British empire 1870, Anglo-American World Power since 1914

Làthaireachd Chrìosd, Co-dhùnadh siostam nan rudan (Mata 24:3), na làithean mu dheireadh (2 Timòteus 3:1)
english: Presence of Christ, Conclusion of the system of things (Matthew 24:3), the last days (2 Timothy 3:1)

english: A great crowd survives Armageddon (Revelation 7:9, 14; Psalm 37:9-11)

text: Àireamh-sluaigh na cruinne ann am billeanan anns na 2000 bliadhna a dh’ fhalbh
english: World population in billions in the last 2000 years
